title: "Locker Room Talk" to Explaining Rape Culture
itunes:title: "Locker Room Talk" to Explaining Rape Culture
description:
Mon 10/10/16 - What better way to start off the week with talk about vagina grabbing and then going right into rape culture! After disturbing audio surfaced of Donald Trump demeaning women, we had to make it topic of discussion, and give him his monthly award of Donkey of the Day. Today can easily be mistaken as Freaky Friday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
